prerequisites: Basic understanding of physical and chemical changes
learning_outcomes: Students will be able to differentiate between reversible and irreversible changes.
Students will be able to identify and group changes based on their characteristics.
Students will be able to observe and analyze changes in their environment.
suggested_examples: Blowing up and deflating a balloon
Folding and unfolding a piece of paper
Heating and cooling a metal rim for a cart wheel
Burning a candle and measuring its length
